original_title: ROH: The Best of CM Punk Vol. 3 - The Legacy Continues
overview: The legacy of CM Punk continues to grow as this superstar takes on his fiercest competition yet on this Best Of DVD. See some of the most historic bouts in CM Punk's career from his epic match of the year battles against Samoa Joe to his violent feud against Jimmy Rave.  01. CM Punk vs. Samoa Joe...World Title Classic 6/12/04 (final 15 minutes)  02. CM Punk vs. Samoa Joe...Joe vs. Punk II 10/16/04 (final 15 minutes)  03. CM Punk & Ace Steel vs. Austin Aries & Roderick Strong (No DQ Match)...Weekend of Thunder Night 2 11/6/04  04. CM Punk vs. Samoa Joe...All Star Extravaganza II 12/4/04  05. CM Punk vs. Alex Shelley...Third Anniversary Celebration Pt. 2- Dayton, OH 2/25/05  06. CM Punk vs. Jimmy Rave...Third Anniversary Celebration Pt. 3- Chicago Ridge, IL 2/26/05  07. CM Punk vs. Jimmy Rave (Dog Collar Match)...Manhattan Mayhem 5/7/05  08. CM Punk vs. Roderick Strong...The Future Is Now 6/12/05  09. CM Punk vs. Jimmy Rave (Steel Cage Grudge Match)...Nowhere To Run 5/14/05
title: ROH: The Best of CM Punk Vol. 3 - The Legacy Continues
